answerText: proline [or Pro or P][10] Proline is hydroxylated in this protein, which is a component of connective tissue that has a triple helix. The fourth isoform of this protein is commonly found in basement membranes.

subject: Science
question: Question: The isomerization of this amino acid can significantly slow down protein folding. For 10 points each: [10] Name this amino acid which occurs in cis and trans isomers, whose side chain loops back and binds to its amine group.
